metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6777 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ZoneMinder v1.32.3. Reflected XSS exists in web/skins/classic/views/plugin.php via the zm/index.php?view=plugin pl parameter.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-6777` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.32.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.32.3-2').
